# Protocol Optimization: File Audit

### üóëÔ∏è ELIMINAR (Redundantes/Dev-Only)
- `aggregate-telemetry.yml` (Protocol dev only)
- `build-tools.yml` (Protocol dev only)
- `ci-health.yml` (High frequency project noise)
- `copilot-meta-analysis.yml` (Overkill tokens)
- `evolution-cycle.yml` (Too complex for current phase)
- `protocol-propagation.yml` (This is not the source repo)
- `release.yml` (Not releasing protocol from here)
- `setup-labels.yml` (Run once, already done)
- `workflow-validator.yml` (Protocol infra validation)

### ‚úÖ CONSERVAR (Herramientas diarias)

- `agent-state.ps1/sh` (Diagn√≥stico)

- `init_project.ps1/sh` (Ya ejecutado)
- `install-cli.ps1/sh` (Instalador local)
